definitions.body: blood of man or animal, = the life ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]) Ge 9:4 (P) De 12:23, Le 17:14, Le 17:14 (H); cf. [[נֶפֶשׁ הַבָּשָׂר]] [[בַּדָּם הִוא]] v:Le 17:11 (H) & [[דִּמְכֶם לְנַפְשׁׂתֵיכֶם]] Ge 9:5 (P); see also Ps 72:14 [[וְיֵיקַר דָּמָם בְּעֵינׇיו]]; hence blood of animals not to be eaten Le 3:17, Le 7:26, Le 7:27(all P) Le 17:10, Le 17:10, Le 17:12, Le 17:12, Le 17:14, Le 19:26 (all H) De 12:16, De 12:23, De 15:23, 1Sa 14:32, 1Sa 14:33, 1Sa 14:34, Ez Eze 33:25 (cf. RS:K 310), but to be poured out & covered with dust Le 17:13 (cf. RS:Sem. i. 216 f.).
usually blood become visible,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as from a wound [[הַמַּכָּה]] ´[[ד]] 1Ki 22:35 (cf. [[חֲתַן דָּמִים]] Ex 4:25; Ex 4:26 v. infr.

definitions.title: h
definitions.body: ); licked by dogs 1Ki 21:19, 1Ki 21:19, 1Ki 22:38, Ez Eze 32:6; from the nose Pr 30:33; bloody issue of a woman Le 15:19 cf. v:Le 15:25; pl. [[דְּמֵי טָֽגהֳרָה]] Le 12:4, Le 12:5, & [[מְקׂר דָּמֶיהָ]] v:Le 12:7 (all P) Le 20:18 (H); blood in which child welters Ez Eze 16:6, Eze 16:6, Eze 16:22 + v:Eze 16:6 (del. AB SyrVer Co al.); of goat Ge 37:31 (JE); of slain bird Le 14:6, Le 14:51, Le 14:52.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: oft. obj. of [[שָׁפַח]], spill, shed Ge 9:6 (P) Ge 37:22 (E) Nu 35:33 (P) Le 17:4 (H) De 21:7, 1Sa 25:31, 1Ki 18:28, 2Ki 21:16, 2Ki 24:4, 1Ch 22:8, Ez Eze 16:38, Eze 22:4, Eze 22:6, Eze 22:9, Eze 22:12, Eze 22:27, Eze 23:45, Eze 33:25, Eze 36:18 (del. B Co) Pr 1:16 also Ps 79:3 [[שָֽׁפְכוּ דָמָם כַּמַּיִם]]; [[שׁׂפֵח דָּם]] a blood-shedder  Ez Eze 18:10; [[עִיר שׁׂפֶכֶת דָּם]] Ez Eze 22:3 cf. v:Eze 22:4 (also 1Ki 2:31, Je 22:3, Je 22:17, 1Ch 22:8, 1Ch 28:3, Pr 6:17, La 4:13); less oft. subj. of pass. [[פָוּךְ]], [[נִשְׁפָּח]], etc. Ge 9:6, Nu 35:33 (both P) De 19:10, Zep 1:17, Ps 79:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[דַּם חָלָל]] De 32:42 (song) blood of slain; [[חֲלָלִים]] ´[[ד]] 2Sa 1:22 so Nu 23:24 (JE), obj. of [[שָׁתָה]], of Isr. under fig. of lion; cf. also Ez Eze 39:17, Eze 39:18, Eze 39:19, & 2Sa 23:17 = 1Ch 11:19 ([[דַּם הָאֲנׇשִׁים]] hyperbol. for imperilled life); as food of young eagles Job 39:30.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: oft. of innocent blood, i.e. blood shed with injustice & cruelty, [[דָּם נׇקִי]] De 21:8, De 21:9, 1Sa 19:5, 2Ki 21:16, 2Ki 24:4, Ps 94:21, Ps 106:38 cf. v:Ps 106:38, Pr 6:17, Is 59:7, Je 7:6, Je 22:3 (also Je 26:15); [[דָּם נׇקִיא]] Joe 4:19, Jon 1:14; also in cstr. [[דַּם נׇקִי]] De 19:10; cf. De 27:25 [[לְהַכּוֹת נֶפֶשׁ]] ´[[נ]] ´[[ד]]; [[דַּם הַנׇּקִי]] De 19:13, Je 22:17, 2Ki 24:4; [[דַּם נְקִיִּים]] Je 19:4; [[דַּם נַפְשׁוֹת אֶבְיוֹנִים נְקִיִּים]] Je 2:34; further [[דַּם חַדִּיקִים]] La 4:13; [[דְּמֵי חִנׇּם]] 1Ki 2:31; in Ps 31:10 [[דָּמִי]] = my death (‖[[רִדְתִּי אֶל־שַׁחַת]]).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: pl. [[דָּמִים]] of abundance, blood in quantity, hence sts. of blood shed by rude violence, and of blood-stains;—Ge 4:10, Ge 4:11(J) as crying from the ground for vengeance (cf. RS:Sem. i. 397), comp. also 2Sa 3:28, 2Sa 16:8, 2Ki 9:26, 2Ki 9:26, Is 1:15, Is 9:4, Is 26:21, Ez Eze 16:6, Eze 16:6, Eze 16:6, Eze 16:9, Eze 16:36 (on txt. of v:Eze 16:6 vid. supr.) Zec 9:7, 2Ch 24:25; [[דְּמֵי אָדָם]] Hb Hab 2:8, Hab 2:17, and in other connexions; but interchangeably with sg. 2Sa 3:27, 2Sa 20:12, 2Ki 9:33, Is 34:3, Is 34:6, Is 34:6, Is 34:7, Ez Eze 21:32, Eze 22:13 (pl. Co) Eze 24:8, Eze 24:8 al.; v. esp. [[אֶרֶץ אַל־תְּכַסִּי דָמִי]] Job 16:18; [[דְּמֵי ירושׁלם]] blood-stains of Jerusalem Is 4:4; = slaughter, sg. Ge 37:26 (J) Je 48:10, Ez Eze 5:17, Eze 28:23 (‖[[דֶּבֶר]]) Eze 38:22 (‖ id.); [[דַּם־עֲבָדָיו]] De 32:43 (song: cf. Ps 79:10); pl. [[דְּמֵי עֲבָדַי]] 2Ki 9:7, 2Ki 9:7; [[דְּמֵי יִזְרְעֶאל]] Ho 1:4; bloodshed at Jezreel; cf. [[דָּמִים בְּדָמִים]] [[נׇגׇ֑עוּ]] Ho 4:2; [[דְּמֵי מִלְחָמָה]] 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:5; in Ez Eze 9:9 [[וַתִּמָּלֵא הָאָרֶץ חָמָס]] (Baer) rd. [[דָּמִים]] for [[חָמָס]] v.d. H Vrss Co Comm.; [[אָרַב לְדָם]] lie in wait for blood Pr 1:11 cf. v:Pr 1:18, Pr 12:6, Mic 7:2; [[דָּמִים]] of a plan of murder Is 33:15 (obj. of [[שׁמע]]); [[מִשְׁפַּט דָּמִים]] Ez Eze 7:23 bloody crime; as symbol of oppression, violence Mic 3:10 (‖[[עַוְלָה]]), Hb Hab 2:12 (‖ id.)

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[דָּמִים]] = guilt of bloodshed, blood-guiltiness Ex 22:1, then more generally, mortal sin (RS:OTJC 417, 2nd ed. 441, cf. Ez Eze 18:13) Ps 51:16 (cf. Ho 12:15); also [[בּוֹא בְדָמִים]] 1Sa 25:26, 1Sa 25:33.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: pl. also in pharses: [[חֲתַן דָּמִים]] bloody bridegroom Ex 4:25, Ex 4:26; also those denoting character, chiefly poet., [[אִישׁ דָּמִים]] bloody man (sanguinary) 2Sa 16:8, Ps 5:7 [[אִישׁ הַדָּמִים]] 2Sa 16:7; [[אַנְשֵׁי דָּמִים]], Ps 26:9, Ps 55:24, Ps 59:3, Ps 139:19, Pr 29:10; [[ואל־בֵּית הַדָּמִים]] bloody house 2Sa 21:1 but rd. with LXX We Dr [[ואל בֵּיתׂה דמים]], & on his house is blood; [[עִיר דָּמִים]] Na 3:1; [[עִיר]] [[הַדָּמִים]] Ez Eze 22:2, Eze 24:6 + v:Eze 24:9 (del. B Co).

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: [[דָּמָיו בּוֹ]] his blood is in (upon) him, he is responsible for his own death Le 20:9 cf. v:Le 20:11, v:Le 20:12, v:Le 20:13, v:Le 20:16, v:Le 20:27 (all H), Ez Eze 18:13 ( + [[יִהְיֶה]]); [[דָּמוֹ בּוֹ]] Ez Eze 33:5; [[דָּמוֹ בְּראׁשׁוֹ]] Jos 2:19, Jos 2:19; so with [[שָׁבוּ]] 1Ki 2:33, [[יִהְיֶה]] v:1Ki 2:37, Ez Eze 33:4; [[דָּֽמְ֠יךָ עַל ראׁשֶָׁךָ]] 2Sa 1:16, and [[אֶת־דָּמוֹ עַל־ראׁשׁוֹ]] ´[[הֵשִׁיב י]] 1Ki 2:32; also [[לאׁ תָשִׂים דָּמִים בְּבֵיתְךָ]] De 22:8; and [[דָּמָם לָשׂוּם]] [[עַל אֲבִימֶלֶח]] Ju Jdg 9:24; ([[אל]])[[נׇתַן דָּם על ]] Je 26:15, Jon 1:14; [[וְהָיׇה עָלָיךָ דָּמִים]] De 19:10, v. 2Sa 21:1 supr.; also sg. Ez Eze 22:4 [[בְּדָמֵח אָשַׁמְתְּ]], and as subj. of [[יֵחָשֵׁב לְ]] shall be imputed to Le 17:4 (H); [[אֵין לוֹ דָמִים]] Ex 22:1 cf. v:Ex 22:2 (both JE) & (sg.) Nu 35:27 (P).

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: of judicial process in case of bloodshed [[דָּבָר]] [[לַמִּשְׁפָּט בֵּין־דָּם לְדָם]] De 17:8 cf. 2Ch 19:10; [[לאׁ תַּעֲמׂד]] [[עַל־דַּם רֵעֶָךָ]] Le 19:16 (H).

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: in phrase require blood at the hand of, exact vengeance (for it) from, [[דָּרַשׁ דָּמוֹ מִיַּד]] Ez Eze 33:6, Ge 9:5; [[דָּמוֹ נִדְרָשׁ]] Ge 42:22 (E); abs. [[דּׂרשׁ דמים]] Ps 9:13; [[אֲבַקֵּשׁ אֶת־דָּמוֹ מִיֶּדְכֶם]] 2Sa 4:11 cf. Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 3:20, Eze 33:8; [[עַל־]] ´[[פָּקַד ד]] Ho 1:4; ´[[וְנִקֵּיתִי ד]] Joe 4:21; Ez Eze 35:6, Eze 35:6, Eze 35:6, Eze 35:6; cf. on the other hand ´[[אַל־יִפּׂל דָּמִי אַרְחָה מִנֶּגֶד פְּנֵי י]] 1Sa 26:20 i.e. let it not de unavenged.

of blood as defiling a land Nu 35:33 (P) cf. Ps 106:38 (pl. [[בדמים]]); [[עֲקֻבָּה]] [[מִדָּם]] Ho 6:8 of a city foot-printed (VB) with blood; defiling hands Is 1:15, Is 59:3, La 4:14 cf. Ez Eze 23:37, Eze 23:45; further, of blood as oppressing one who has shed it [[עָשֻׁק בְּדַם נֶפֶשׁ]] Pr 28:l7.

definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: atonement for blood-guilt is expressed by [[וְנִכַּפֵּר לָהֶם הַדָּם]] De 21:8 (on form of vb. cf. Ges:§ 55, 9 & Di).

definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: blood (-shedding) as connected with divine wrath [[וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֫י חֲמָתִי עָלָיהָ בְּדָם]] Ez Eze 14:19; [[דַּם חֵמָה וְקִנְאָה]] Ez Eze 16:38; v. further [[אַשְׁכִּיר חִצַּי מִדָּם]] De 32:42, cf. Je 46:10; cf. also of human vengeance by divine help [[יִרְחַץ בְּדַם הָרָשָׁע]] Ps 58:11; [[תִּמֲחַץ רַגְלְךָ בְּדָם]] Ps 68:24; note further Is 49:26, Ez Eze 39:19 (in both fig. of being drunk with blood); then of simple human vengeance [[וְהוֹרַדְתָּ֫ אֶת־שֵׂיבָתוֹ בְּדָם שְׁאוֹל]] 1Ki 2:9.

definitions.title: o.
definitions.body: of water turned into blood (sg.) in Egypt, by divine power Ex 4:9 (J) Ex 7:17, Ex 7:20 (JE) v:Ex 7:19, v:Ex 7:19, v:Ex 7:21 (P) Ps 78:44, Ps 105:29; cf. Is 15:9 & Ez Eze 32:6; further, of appearance of blood in sky Joe 3:3, & of colour of moon v:Joe 3:4; specifically of red colour of water [[אֲדֻמִּים כַּדָּם]] 2Ki 3:22 cf. v:2Ki 3:23.
blood used with religious significance,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: blood of passover-lamb Ex 12:7, Ex 12:13, Ex 12:13 (all P) v:Ex 12:22, v:Ex 12:22, v:Ex 12:23 (all JE); note also [[דַּם הַבְּרִית]], i.e. blood by which covenant was ratified Ex 24:8 (JE) Zec 9:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: blood used in ritual, Le 17:11 [[הַדָּם הוּא בַּנֶּפֶשׁ יְכַפֵּר]] (H); cf. 2Ch 29:24; also Ez Eze 44:7, Eze 44:15 (both ‖[[חֵלָב]]); further Le 1:5, Is 1:11, Ps 50:13; thrown on altar, vb. [[זׇרַק]] usually c. [[עַל]] Ex 24:6 (JE) Ex 29:16, Ex 29:20, Le 1:5, Le 1:11, Le 3:2, Le 3:8, Le 3:13, Le 7:2, Le 7:14, Le 8:19, Le 8:24, Le 9:12, Le 9:18 (all P) Le 17:6 (H) Nu 18:17 (P) Ez Eze 43:18, 2Ki 16:13, 2Ki 16:15, 2Ki 16:15, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:22 cf. 2Ch 30:16; sprinkled, vb. [[הִזׇּה]] Le 5:9, Le 16:19 (both P); sprinkled toward tent of meeting (vb. [[הִזׇּה]]) Nu 19:4, Nu 19:4 (P); brought into tent of meeting Le 4:5, Le 4:16, Le 6:23 cf. Le 10:18 (all P); sprinkled toward the holy of holies (vb. [[הִזׇּה]]) Le 4:6, Le 4:6, Le 4:17, Le 16:14, Le 16:14 (all P); brought within the veil on day of atonement Le 16:15, Le 16:15, Le 16:15 (cf. v:Le 16:14) v:Le 16:27 (all P); thrown on people Ex 24:8 (JE; [[זׇרַק]]); sprinkled on priests ([[הִזׇּה]]) Ex 29:21, Le 8:30 (both P); on garment (in sanctuary, [[הִזׇּה]]) Le 6:20 (P); applied with finger to horns of altar Ex 29:12, Le 4:7, Le 4:18, Le 4:25, Le 4:30, Le 4:34, Le 8:15, Le 9:9, Le 9:9, Le 9:9, Le 16:18, Le 16:18 (all P; also Ez Eze 45:19) Ez Eze 43:20; applied to tip of right ear of priest Ex 29:20, Le 8:23, Le 8:24 (all P; also Le 14:14, Le 14:25 P); poured out at base of altar ([[שָׁפַח אֶל־]]) Ex 29:12, Le 4:7, Le 4:18, Le 4:25, Le 4:30, Le 4:34 (all P); cf. with [[מָחָה]] (Niph.) Le 1:15, Le 5:9; with [[יׇחַק]] Le 8:15 (all P); half of blood put in basons Ex 24:6 (JE); blood poured out on altar De 12:27, De 12:27; blood of red heifer burned Nu 19:5 (P); vid. further such terms as [[דַּם זִבְחִי]] Ex 23:18, Ex 34:25 (both JE) (cf. De 12:27, 2Ki 16:15); [[דַּם הַשְּׁלָמִים]] Le 7:33 (P; cf. v:Le 7:14); [[דַּם חַטָּאת הַכִּפֻּרִים]] Ex 30:10 (P) cf. Ez Eze 45:19; [[דַּם הָאָשָׁם]] Le 14:14, Le 14:17, Le 14:25, Le 14:28; (v. [[זֶבַח]], [[שֶׁלֶם]], [[חַטָּאת]], [[אָשָׁם]]); [[דַּם־חֲזִיר]], swine's blood, as heathen offering Is 66:3; cf. [[נִסְכֵּיהֶם מִדָּם]] Ps 16:4 (v. Che).

fig. of wine [[דַּם־עֲנׇבִים]] Ge 49:11 (blessing of Jacob ‖[[יַיִן]]); cf. De 32:14 (song) [[דַּם עֵנׇב תִּשְׁתֶּה־חָָמֶר]].—[[בְּדָֽמְךָ]] Ez Eze 19:10 prob. text. error cf. VB; Da prop: [[בְּרוּמָהּ]] in her height.
